Posts.Content: Hi I was diagnosed with Triple negative breast cancer in Jan 11, I had a mastectomy followed by 8 ec and 12 weekly taxols, am now awaiting a tumour marker test to see if I am cancer free. Positivity is the key, I wouldnt like to go thru it again but I want to be here its not my time.Â  We are individuals not statistics, dont listen to anyone just concentrate on getting well. xx
